scripts.build: npm run -w packages/app build; npm run -w packages/api build
scripts.gcp:build: gcloud builds submit --config cloudbuild.yaml --substitutions=COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo latest)
scripts.gcp:deploy: gcloud run deploy l0012 --source . --port 50012 --region us-central1 --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.gcp:logs: gcloud run logs read l0012 --region us-central1
